article_text:
The 2015 race for the Republican presidential nomination hasn’t been an entirely serious affair.

ADVERTISEMENT

From frontrunner Donald Trump’s spoof of Drake’s hit “Hotline Bling” on “Saturday Night Live” to Sen. Ted Cruz’s (Texas) impersonations of “The Simpsons,” there have been plenty of light moments.

With GOP candidates hitting the debate stage one more time tonight, click on the video above to see some of the most memorable but light moments from the 2015 campaign trail.
